name: Frankanoid
description:
This is just a physics-based version of Arkanoid I made in Unity during a week, using my spare time. It features physics, HDRP, powerups, high scores, music, and much other fanciness.

Two months ago I was so tired about coding in javascript all the time in my job that I decided I wanted to start learning Unity to have some coding activity to relieve myself from that fatigue. I spent this time doing courses in Unity learning. Last week I finished the last one and decided I wanted to put all i learned into small games rather than keep doing courses. So, this the very first one. Probably it doesn't worth your download, but I was looking forward to uploading my first game to itch.io :D

Credits to Bensound for the awesome music, available for free in his webpage.

W10 executable

Project available in github
